General.Name: Starwood European Real Estate Finance Ltd
General.Description: Starwood European Real Estate Finance Ltd. specializes in making real estate debt investments. The fund invests in Europe with a focus on the United Kingdom and wider European Union's internal market, focusing on Northern and Southern Europe. It provides loans with a term between three and seven years.
General.Address: Princes House, London, United Kingdom, SW1Y 6DN
